cardstypes.title: TRAINING
cardstypes.body:
- Smartphone or computer:
 - Personal Link: (paste personal link)
 - Comments: (quality of the connection, language skill, member of groups or associations,...)

cardstypes.title: SECOND SURVEY
cardstypes.body:
• Agrees with the general framings: (yes or no)
 • Personal change: (yes or no)
 • Interested in Introductive meeting: (yes or no)
 • Introductive meeting date: (also put the date using the Trello tool)

cardstypes.title: INTRODUCTORY MEETING
cardstypes.body:
• Attitude (Followed with attention and interest):
 • Understanding of the themes:
 • Practice execution:
 • Participation in interchanges:
 • Notes:

cardstypes.title: APPRENTICE TRAINER
cardstypes.body:
- explanation thematic part: (yes or no)
 - explanation how to do the survey and link creation: (yes or no)
 - Invitation session and Alpha Café and doodle calendar: (yes or no)

cardstypes.title: APPRENTICE ORGANIZER OF SURVEY SESSIONS
cardstypes.body:
- Mark the people in red or orange in the Google calendar: (yes or no)
 - Send the remainder the day before for the training and second survey: (yes or no)
 - Mark in the Google calendar the trainers and second survey conductors: (yes or no)
 - Mark in the Doodle calendar the interviewers and move them in the Google calendar (and delete them from the Doodle): (yes or no)
 - Fill in the Trello and registers for the training and monitor that the Technical-trainers and second survey conductors compile Trello and registers: (yes or no)
 - Send the Doodle for the training and second surveys to all those who did not participate: (yes or no)

cardstypes.title: APPRENTICE COORDINATOR OF SURVEY SESSIONS
cardstypes.body:
- Check if there are enough trainers and conductors for the second surveys: (yes or no)
 - Create the group chat with the interviewers: (yes or no)
 - Organize training and second surveys at the beginning of the survey session: (yes or no)
 - Introduce the survey session, the initial explanations and the targets: (yes or no)
 - Send the most expert interviewers with the new ones: (yes or no)
 - Stimulates the interviewers and check the Admin: (yes or no)
 - Closing message in the chat and fill in Trello and registers: (yes or no)

cardstypes.title: CONDUCTING THE SECOND SURVEY
cardstypes.body:
• Ability to explain the topics of the introduction: (yes or no)
 • Ability to deepen the second question: (yes or no)
 • Clarity about the invitation to the introductory meeting: (yes or no)
 • Clarity in inviting to participate in our activities: (yes or no)

cardstypes.title: EXPLANATION ALPHA CAFE
cardstypes.body:
-Interested in participating in Alpha Café: (yes or no)
 -Interested in participating in Survey sessions: (yes or no)
 -Comments: (quality of the connection, language skill, etc.)

cardstypes.title: SPECIFIC AMBITS
cardstypes.body:
-University: (Yes or no) 
 -Groups/associations: (Yes or no)
 -Other comments: (number of members/ frequency of meetings or communications/ presential or virtual meetings/ communication channel)
